title: Star Wars audio books - New Jedi Order Era
description:
Read this carefully please!!
It might look like a lot but it contains some valuable information!

Here&#039;s the fifth in a series of Star Wars audio books eras.
To follow is the &#039;Legacy Era&#039;, &#039;The Story of Star Wars&#039; (not an about) and the original radio dramas with naration (so-called &#039;Special Edition&#039; by the maker); both in one torrent.

All files are packed with Winrar, not to save space but to make it easier to select which audio books you want.

You will notice that every file has the "bitrate per second" noted (kbps)
VBR stands for "variable bitrate", meaning that not every file in the .rar file has the same bitrate.
This should make it easier to find out if you already have downloaded a particular audio book. (by comparing your own to the one in this torrent based on file size and bitrate)

I also included 2 programs: "File Renamer Deluxe" & Piston&#039;s "Direct WAV MP3 Splitter" for obvious reasons. 

All files are named properly: [Track number] - [Possible series name] - [Book title].mp3 

As you can see on this list,    <a href="
http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_Star_Wars_Audio_Books" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_Star_Wars_Audio_Books</a>
This torrent contains all the books for this Era.

If anyone has &#039;The Truce at Bakura&#039; or &#039;Bounty Hunter Wars 3 - Hard Merchandise&#039; on an original format, please rip this and contact me in the comments.

I suggest you bookmark my account (http://thepiratebay.se/user/Starkiller20/) to stay up to date easily. 

Feel free to ask questions or criticize.
I read the comments and will get back to you as soon as possible.
